title: The Classic Denim Overall
description:
Classic mid rise rigid denim overalls

Everyone needs a go-to pair of overalls, and The Classic Denim Overall is it. Made from rigid denim, it will be snug at first, but shapes to your body with every wear. Super versatile, style these relaxed denim dungarees over your favourite tee or turtleneck. The cherry on top? It has all the pockets.

- Adjustable straps
- Relaxed fit
- Short shorts length
- Cuffed hems
- 6 pocket detail
- Authentic vintage look
- Rigid denim
- Snug at first, but shapes to your body
